archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.6.8: Acceptance of each risk should be subject to approval and sign-off by a sufficiently senior individual, such as a representative of executive management (e.g. a senior executive or equivalent).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
